name: Flowing Rings
description:
After the character uses a Normal Attack: Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Enthralling Tales Passed On: Flowing Rings
storytext: "...And the stone that had been lost to the waters may have been a lesser jade, or perhaps just a simple cup. Some even say that the "jade" in the tale is in fact an analogy for a beautiful person."
